title: New Version of Journler
excerpt: [digg=http://www.digg.com/software/New_Version_of_Journler]A new version of my favorite blogging software, Journler, has just been released. The new version is 2.5 and includes a very spiffy interface upgrade to match that of the 7.0+ versions of iTunes. Version 2.5 includes more than just an interface overhaul.
